title: Katie Price plans to introduce Harvey to his dad Dwight Yorke by turning up on his doorstep
text:

Katie Price has revealed she plans to introduce her 17 year-old son Harvey to his dad, former footballer Dwight Yorke.

Back on he YouTube channel, Katie documented her hair-styling session with pal Mel, where she dropped the bombshell about her former flame.

The former model and Dwight were in a relationship in the early noughties, but the pair called it quits in 2002 shortly after Harvey's birth.

41 year-old Katie claims Dwight has only seen the lad a few times since - and that he's been mostly absent from Harvey's life.

Chatting with Mel about Harvey's Instagram profile and her plans to make him a YouTube channel, Katie said: "What I would like to do is turn up at his dad's place - Dwight Yorke's - ring the doorbell and be there with Harvey, for him to see Harvey.

(Image: You Tube / Katie Price)

(Image: You Tube / Katie Price)

"That's what I would like to do and I will do that. I think Dwight should start entering Harvey's life, it's been years."

Harvey has Prader-Willi Syndrome, and is also autistic and partially blind.

"How long has it been?" Katie asks Mel, "Harvey was four when he last saw him."

(Image: UK Press via Getty Images)

(Image: Rex Features)

Mel chimes in: "Yeah, but how many opportunities have you given him?"

Katie adds: "I would love Dwight to come into contact with Harvey. How can you not want to know Harv? He's so funny."

Katie's autobiography claims: "The last time Harvery's biological father Dwight Yorke saw him, which was around eight years ago, the first thing he asked was why was Harvey so big. Why was I overfeeding him?

"I'd explained Harvey's condition to Dwight many times, but he refused to understand it and kept going on about him being fat.

"It's sad that he's unable to accept Harvey for who he is and seems unable or unwilling to work within his limitations.

"On that occasion, I think Dwight wanted to blame someone for the fact that his son is disabled.

"I have always said that if Dwight could see what a courageous and talented boy Harvey is then he would enjoy being with him so much."

Katie also reminds fans to watch out for an official Harvey Price YouTube channel, which is on its way.

She says: "So, Harvey's got a YouTube channel coming up. But don't forget me when you're watching."
description: Katie took to her YouTube channel again, where she dished about her idea of bringing Harvey and dad Dwight together for the first time since the teenager was four years old
